nodes.text: TC-38, also known as TeeCee, was a silver protocol droid who served aboard the Star Runner.
TC-38 saw action when Mavra Zane's Padawans and Chewbacca flew the Star Runner, while fighting the Trandoshan Commerce Guild's forces across Kashyyyk and Felucia.
Upon landing on Felucia, TeeCee was hit by enemy fire and disabled, though she was later repaired by Chewbacca and was present at the knighting of Zane's apprentices.
TC-38 was voiced by Jean Gilpin with reference modeling by Jul Kohler.
